item.title: Items While Trading . How Do i Put (K) / (B) / (M) of the amount of item?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

								} else if(inputDialogState == 1) {
            if(j >= 48 && j <= 57 && amountOrNameInput.length() < 10) {
               amountOrNameInput += (char)j;
               inputTaken = true;
            }
            if(j == 8 && amountOrNameInput.length() > 0) {
               amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.substring(0, amountOrNameInput.length() - 1);
               inputTaken = true;
            }
                                if (j == 13 || j == 10) {
                                        if (amountOrNameInput.length() > 0) {
                                                if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("k")) {
                                                        amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("k", "000");
                                                } else if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("m")) {
                                                        amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("m", "000000");
                                                } else if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) {
                                                        amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("b", "000000000");
                                                }
                                                int amount = 0;
                                                amount = Integer.parseInt(amountOrNameInput);
                                                stream.createFrame(208);
                                                stream.writeDWord(amount);
                                        }
                                        inputDialogState = 0;
                                        inputTaken = true;
                                }

item.source: Items While Trading . How Do i Put (K) / (B) / (M) of the amount of item?

item.title: Items While Trading . How Do i Put (K) / (B) / (M) of the amount of item?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[QUOTE=Galkon]On RuneScape you can enter “200k” in the input dialog to withdraw 200k, 200m for 200m, etcetera. This is a modification to allow that. Simple, but useful ^^.

[COLOR=“Red”]Before I get complaints about errors, I’ve refactored many variables in my client, so you’ll have to compare to your method. Feel free to post one for standard renamed.[/COLOR]

In what you’ll know as ‘method73’, replace the inputDialogState == 1 section with this:

} else if (inputDialogState == 1) { if (pressedKey >= 48 && pressedKey <= 57 && dialogInput.length() < 10) { dialogInput += (char) pressedKey; inputTaken = true; } if ((!dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("k") && !dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("m") && !dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) && (pressedKey == 107 || pressedKey == 109) || pressedKey == 98) { dialogInput += (char) pressedKey; inputTaken = true; } if (pressedKey == 8 && dialogInput.length() > 0) { dialogInput = dialogInput.substring(0, dialogInput.length() - 1); inputTaken = true; } if (pressedKey == 13 || pressedKey == 10) { if (dialogInput.length() > 0) { if (dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("k")) { dialogInput = dialogInput.replaceAll("k", "000"); } else if (dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("m")) { dialogInput = dialogInput.replaceAll("m", "000000"); } else if (dialogInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) { dialogInput = dialogInput.replaceAll("b", "000000000"); } int amount = 0; amount = Integer.parseInt(dialogInput); out.putOpCode(208); out.putInt(amount); } inputDialogState = 0; inputTaken = true; } }

Standard:

} else if (inputDialogState == 1) { if (j >= 48 && j <= 57 && amountOrNameInput.length() < 10) { amountOrNameInput += (char) j; inputTaken = true; } if ((!amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("k") && !amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("m") && !amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) && (j == 107 || j == 109) || j == 98) { amountOrNameInput += (char) j; inputTaken = true; } if (j == 8 && amountOrNameInput.length() > 0) { amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.substring(0, amountOrNameInput.length() - 1); inputTaken = true; } if (j == 13 || j == 10) { if (amountOrNameInput.length() > 0) { if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("k")) { amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("k", "000"); } else if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("m")) { amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("m", "000000"); } else if (amountOrNameInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) { amountOrNameInput = amountOrNameInput.replaceAll("b", "000000000"); } int amount = 0; amount = Integer.parseInt(amountOrNameInput); stream.createFrame(208); stream.writeDWord(amount); } inputDialogState = 0; inputTaken = true; }[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
